Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ (\{ 2, 2 \}), (\{ "h2", "Clayton's very own Guild Records" \}), (\{ "text", "Clayton is currently out of town..." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 4, 3 \}), (\{ "h3", "Announcements:" \}), (\{ "text", "Soldier training has been made available at the guild tutor.\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Ooc: A friendly reminder that you need to set your accepted guild duties for those of silver rank or above to set your operations. This can be done by clicking your name in the very top left of the guild panel. Thank you. \" \}), (\{ "h3", "Who's Bothered showing up lately?:" \}), (\{ "members_list", "" \}), (\{ "h3", "Guild Inventory" \}), (\{ "inventory", "" \}), (\{ "page", "Guild Status", "the everything page" \}), (\{ "page", "House Clothing Orders", "house_clothing" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "h3", "House Goldengate" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "House Goldengate, \
\\r\\n\\r\\nWe are a Lesser Noble House, lead by I: Dio Goldengate \
\\r\\nhaving lost our lands i Dio Goldengate have travelled far and wide, \
\\r\\nNow i have returned to Triskillian the only City i ever considered a home \
\\r\\nto rebuild my house\
\\r\\n\\r\\nWe're Regrowing Now, Slowly here in Triskillian. \
\\r\\nWe Currently do not Serve any other House and are independant." \}), (\{ "page", "Members", "membership" \}), (\{ "page", "Stuff We'ld Like", "wanted things" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 4, 4 \}), (\{ "h2", "Clothing Orders" \}), (\{ "h3", "For House Tailors and Seamstresses" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\Notice; Scapti is missing, thusly this project is on hold untill we hire a new house seamstress\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
This page if for easy access to clothing for house members,\
\\r\\norders can be left on this bullitin for house craftsmen to pick up at their leisure\
\\r\\nfinished orders can then be send via courier and paid for in return by the recipient or deducted from their wages by the house should payment fail to be produced.\
\\r\\n\\r\\nHouse Tailors and Seamstresses:\
\\r\\nMiss Ilyasviel Goldengate. (ooc: Courier = Ilya)\
\\r\\n- May preform work under her own whim\
\\r\\nMiss Scapti (ooc: Courier = Scapti)\
\\r\\n- House Seamstress." \}), (\{ "h3", "Orders:" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "There are no Orders outstanding." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "h3", "The Goldengate Membership" \}), (\{ "text", "\Mister Dio Goldengate: His respected self\\\r\\n\
\\r\\nDio is a towering statuesque mouse, with uneven, sleek light brown fur, and wispy white hair, worn in a ponytail. He has a goatee which is long.\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Ilya Goldengate: Daughter to Dio Goldengate\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Michela Goldengate: Neice to Dio Goldengate\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n" \}), (\{ "h3", "House Affiliates" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\Master Clayton: Alchemist\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Miss Demeter: Scholar\" \}), (\{ "h3", "House Servants" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\Awa: Slave to House Goldengate\\\r\\n\
\\r\\nCurrently purchase through four year contract with the Zeiss Slavery Co." \}), (\{ "page", "Introduction Page", "guest" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 4, 3 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Guild Trading, \

(\{ (\{ 6, 4 \}), (\{ "h3", "Things we at House Goldengate would like:" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\Uranium\ \
\\r\\nWe're not too sure what this is, but we'ld like it, if you find any of it we'll pay highly for it!" \}), (\{ "page", "Introduction Page", "guest" \}) \})
